title: 2 Bed, Professional onsite management, Vaulted ceilings
posting_body: ['Your search for the perfect new apartment in North Las Vegas is over.', 'As one of the premier apartment communities, Sedona at Lone Mountain is an ideal place to call home.', 'Offering spacious one, two and three-bedroom apartments, our pet-friendly community has everything you need for a lavish and comfortable lifestyle.', '-State-of-the-art fitness center', '-Courtyard and mountain views', '-Air conditioning with programmable thermostat', '-Move-in with NO SECURITY DEPOSIT:', 'Only a small one-time payment', '-Barbecue pavilion and picnic area', '-Vaulted ceilings', '-In-home washer and dryer                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Featured amenity', '-Private balcony or patio', '-Co-working lounge with complimentary Wi-Fi', '-Direct access to Craig Ranch Park', '-Ceiling fans in dining room and bedrooms', '-Separate dining area', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', 'Equal Housing Opportunity', 'Prices Change Daily', 'Flexible Lease Terms']
